title: A plea for limited monarchy, as it was established in this nation, before the late war in an humble addresse to His Excellency, General Monck / by a zealot for the good old laws of his country, before any faction or caprice, with additions.
author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by T. Mabb for William Shears ...,
